ws.rocket.config

Class Messages

  • java.lang.Object
    • ws.rocket.config.Messages

  • public final class Messages
extends Object
    A simple container for all the error and warning messages generated during parsing and model validation. Error message should be considered critical, while warning messages can be ignored or not tolerated.
    Author:
    Martti Tamm

    • Constructor Summary

      • hasErrors

        public boolean hasErrors()
        Reports whether there are any error messages contained by this object.
        Returns:
        A Boolean that is true when at least one error message exists..

      • hasWarnings

        public boolean hasWarnings()
        Reports whether there are any warning messages contained by this object.
        Returns:
        A Boolean that is true when at least one warning message exists..

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears all messages contained by this object.

      • writeTo

        public void writeTo(PrintStream ps)
        Writes all contained messages to given stream. When there are no messages, nothing will be written.

        The output will be human-readable. If there are errors, they will be listed first.

        Parameters:
        ps - The stream to write to. When it's null and there are messages to be written, this method will fail with a NullPointerException.

        public String toString()
